actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the provisions which presently attribute the income and resources of parents to their children for purposes of determining the eligibility of such children for SSI benefits.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to eliminate provisions which attribute the income and resources of a parent to a child for purposes of determining eligibility for and the amount of SSI benefits for such child.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the provisions which presently attribute the income and resources of parents to their children for purposes of determining the eligibility of such children for SSI benefits.
